$comment: Config created by the server and stored in the projects root (usually /vagrant/projects/) to index projects with the projects directory.

twokeys.description: Contains information about what this config is for

type.description: Tells us this is a PROJECT_MAP config.  PROJECT_MAP must be given for this value so we know we are parsing the right config

createdBy.description: Tells us who created this config: CONTROLLER means server side, DETECTOR means the detector that runs on the client created this config

projects.description: Contains a map of project UUIDs to directories on the detectpr

localPath.description: Local path to project, relative to the projects root (which is set in configs/client-side-config)
